name: Happy Birthday Boyo
description:
It's Boyo's birthday, but those bords have taken his favourite birthday treat!

Travel through the hectic sky to bring back the doughnuts - watch out, because those bords are waging a war. 

Their party poppers are full of terrifying plastic cutlery - watch out, Boyo!

Can you help him out?

Enjoy!

(Game is best played in window view, which the game automatically starts in!)
